input.sentences: on my way to my first day at law school .
too many red lights in this town .
here is the building i think .
yes | here we go | now time to find parking .
what a beautiful building i think i will like it here .
output.sentences: Parking was always difficult to find at the School of law.
Sometimes i found by turning my head i could find a spot easier.
It was already late afternoon by the time i found a parking spot.
On the way to the lecture hall i lay down in the grass on my side and looked at the clock tower.
Paulina was waiting for me just inside the entrance with a fire extinguisher.
